entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is described as not telling someone oﬀ and shaking her ﬁnger in Malfoy’s direction. She was also shouting furiously.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is described as committing a foul on Harry, which delighted the Slytherins and spurred them on to greater heights.

entities.name: alicia
entities.description: Alicia took Gryﬀindor’s penalty but missed by several feet due to her anger.

entities.name: gryffindor team
entities.description: The Gryﬀindor team is described as losing concentration and being behind in the game.

entities.name: slytherin team
entities.description: The Slytherins are described as being spurred on to greater heights by Malfoy’s foul on Harry.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is described as marking Malfoy closely and blocking him from getting near the Snitch.

entities.name: lee
entities.description: Lee is described as groaning at the score of 70-20 in favor of Gryﬀindor.

entities.name: angelina johnson
entities.description: Angelina Johnson gets the Quaﬄe for Gryﬀindor and is encouraged by her teammates.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The Snitch is described as something Harry is trying to protect from Malfoy.

relationships.description: Harry blocks Malfoy from getting near the Snitch.
Malfoy’s foul on Harry spurs the Slytherins to greater heights.
Lee is a part of the Gryﬀindor team and groans at their score.
Angelina Johnson gets the Quaﬄe for Gryﬀindor.
